name: Sarath Sreedharan
content: Sarath Sreedharan Photo Courtesy Zahra Zahedi I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science at Colorado State University. My primary research interests include challenges in human-aware planning and planning with incomplete model-knowledge. You can find my latest CV here. Contact:   Department of Computer Science,   Colorado State University,   USA   Email: sarath [dot] sreedharan [at] colostate [dot] edu
